Good Health and Well-being.reason: No explicit health-oriented content beyond bioinformatics applications

Quality Education.reason: 課程目標與學習成效涵蓋生物信息學理論與實務，並強調團隊專案與學習成效。
evidence: Bioinformatics is an interdisciplinary and emerging field, which develops methods and software tools for understanding biological data.
This course will introduce students to this rapidly growing topic and equip them with some of its fundamental principles, related algorithms, and programming skill as well as useful tools.
Final project is based on teamwork form which is an essential skill in the field of Bioinformatics.

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: 課程提及未來就業於生技產業，但未明確描述經濟增長或就業普及的範圍

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: 課程內容與生物信息學的技術與案例研究，顯示創新與科技基礎設施的關聯。
evidence: This course is dedicated to proteomics, genomics and comparative bioinformatics by case study.

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: 課程內容聚焦於生物信息學與密碼學相關倫理與治理的討論未明示
